title: wine_Lachini_2007_Cuvée_Giselle_Pinot_Noir_(Willamette_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 99291.
country: US.
description: Ron Lachini cleverly assigns his wines to a carefully assembled team of winemakers; this one belongs to Laurent Montalieu. It is the estate reserve, from low-yielding vines. It is a particular success in this much-maligned vintage. Intense and focused, it opens with pungent aromas of forest and clove, tastes of concentrated cranberry and pomegranate fruit, and powers through into a full-bodied, hefty, assertive finish. The tannins are substantial and the winemaking perfect..
designation: Cuvée Giselle.
points: 93.
price: 65.0.
province: Oregon.
region_1: Willamette Valley.
region_2: Willamette Valley.
taster_name: Paul Gregutt.
taster_twitter_handle: @paulgwine .
